Reference

All functions

insectbraindb_species_info() insectbraindb_neuron_info()

Get information on species/neurons from insectbraindb.org

insectbraindb_read_brain()

Read 3D insect brain meshes from insectbraindb.org

insectbraindb_read_neurons()

Read insect neurons from insectbraindb.org

neuromorpho_async_req()

Make multiple asynchronous http requests to neuromorpho.org

neuromorpho_field_counts()

Get the number of different entries for a neuromorpho neuron field

neuromorpho_field_entries()

Return the available meta data entries for neuromorpho neuron fields

neuromorpho_fields()

Return the available meta data fields for neuromorpho neurons

neuromorpho_get_article()

Get information on an article by querying an article ID

neuromorpho_is_api_healthy()

Check whether the neuromorpho.org API is up and running

neuromorpho_literature_field_counts()

Get the number of different articles for a neuromorpho literature field

neuromorpho_literature_field_entries()

Return the available meta data entries for the literature for neuromorpho neuron

neuromorpho_literature_fields()

Return the available meta data fields for the literature for neuromorpho neurons

neuromorpho_literature_search()

Make a custom literature search to the neuromorpho.org repository

neuromorpho_morphometry()

Return measurements for queried neurons

neuromorpho_names_from_ids() neuromorpho_ids_from_names() neuromorpho_field_entries_from_names() neuromorpho_articles_from_neurons()

Convert neuromorpho neuron IDs into neuron names, or other information, and vica versa

neuromorpho_neurons_info()

Get all meta data associated with a neuron

neuromorpho_neurons_meta() neuromorpho_neuron_meta()

Get some of the meta data associated with a neuron

neuromorpho_persistence_vectors()

Return persistence vectors for queried neurons

neuromorpho_read_neurons() neuromorpho_read_neuron()

Read neurons from neuromorpho.org

neuromorpho_search()

Make a custom neuron search to the neuromorpho.org repository
